description: A line item for the Joist summary schedule
title: JoistSummaryItem

Total_Load_plf.description: Total Load in PLF applied to this joist as a uniform load

Live_Load_plf.description: Live load in PLF applied to this joist as a uniform load

Joist Type.description: Type of Joist: K, LH, DLH

IndividualSelfWeight_plf.description: self weight of an individual item in the group in plf

HasNonUniformLoads.description: Flag to determine if this joist group has non uniform loads

Quantity.description: Number of instances of this joist type
